$:/Tekan/AddCard.creator: Riz
$:/Tekan/AddCard.text:
\define newHereButtonTags()
[[$(currentList)$]]
\end


\define addNote()
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/NewNote}} tags=<<newHereButtonTags>> />
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentList>> $subfilter="[{$:/NewNote}]"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/NewNote" text=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/AddNote" text=""/>
\end

\define cancelNote()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/NewNote" text=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/AddNote" text=""/>
\end

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/AddNote" text=<<currentList>>>
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="$:/state/AddNote" setTo=<<currentList>>>Add a card...</$button>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/AddNote" text=<<currentList>>>
      	
  <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<<addNote>> tag="div">
  <$edit-text  autoHeight="yes" focus="yes" placeholder="Add new note" default="New card" tiddler="$:/NewNote"/>
  </$keyboard>
		
        <$button class="smallgreenbutton" actions=<<addNote>>>Add</$button>
        <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin: 0 5px;"  actions=<<cancelNote>>>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</$button>
      	
   
</$reveal>
$:/Tekan/AddCard.title: $:/Tekan/AddCard

$:/Tekan/AddList.title: $:/Tekan/AddList

$:/Tekan/BoardSelect.text:
\define setboard() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" text=<>/> \end <$button popup=<>>Board <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/Tekanboard]!has[draft.of]]">
<$button style="background: #fff;" actions=<>>
  {{!!title}}
$:/Tekan/BoardSelect.title: $:/Tekan/BoardSelect

$:/Tekan/Main.creator: Riz
$:/Tekan/Main.text:
\define currentListTag() [[$(currentList)$]] \end \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="-[tag]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags=<>/> <$list filter="[tag]"> <$action-listops $subfilter="-[]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define currentBoardTags() [[$(currentBoard)$]] \end \define droplist() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $value=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define cardeditops() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/editcard" text=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/Tikan/EditCardModal" currentList=<> currentCard=<>/> \end \define popupstate() $:/state/listops/$(currentList)$ \end \define deletelist() <$list filter="[tag]"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define archivelist() <$list filter="[tag]"> <$action-listops $tags="archive"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> list=""/> \end
{{$:/Tekan/Navbar}}
<$set name="currentBoard" value={{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}}> <$list filter="[tag!has[draft.of]]" variable="currentList">
<$draggable filter="[tag!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/> <$button tag="span" class="icon-sm icon-overflow-menu-horizontal listitem" popup=<>> <$reveal type="popup" position="below" state=<>>
List Actions
<$button tag="div" class="listopsbutton" actions=<>>Delete List <$button tag="div" class="listopsbutton" actions=<>>Archive List
    <$list filter="[tag!tag[archive]sortby{!!list}!has[draft.of]]">
    <$droppable actions=<>>
     
    <$draggable tiddler=<> tag="li"><$view field="title"/> <$button tag="span" class="icon-sm icon-edit list-card-operation listitem" actions=<>>
<$tiddler tiddler="">
<$droppable actions=<> tag="div">
 
{{||$:/Tekan/AddCard}}
{{||$:/Tekan/AddList}} <$reveal state="$:/state/rearrlist" type="match" text="show">
Lists of <>
    <$list filter="[tagsortby{!!list}]">
    <$droppable actions=<>>
     
    <$draggable tiddler=<> tag="li"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/>
<$button class="smallgreenbutton" set="$:/state/rearrlist" setTo="">Done
$:/Tekan/Main.title: $:/Tekan/Main

$:/Tekan/Navbar.creator: Riz
$:/Tekan/Navbar.text:
{{$:/Tekan/BoardSelect}}
{{$:/Tekan/NavboardButtons}} <$list filter="[tag[$:/Tekan/BoardbarButton]]"> <$transclude/>
<$set name="currentBoard" filter="[{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}minlength[1]]" value={{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}} emptyValue="You need to either create a board or switch to an existing one"><$text text=<>/>
$:/Tekan/Navbar.title: $:/Tekan/Navbar

$:/Tekan/NavboardButtons.creator: Riz
$:/Tekan/NavboardButtons.text:
\define AddNewBoard() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/boardNewTitle}} tags="$:/tags/Tekanboard"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" $value={{$:/state/boardNewTitle}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/boardNewTitle" text=""/> \end \define deleteboard() <$set name="currentBoard" value={{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}}> <$list filter="[tag]" variable="currentList"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[tag]" variable="currentCard"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[tag]" variable="currentChecklistitem"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" text=""/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/deleteboardpopup"/> \end <$set name="currentBoard" value={{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}}> <$list filter="[tag[$:/Tekan/Button]]"><$transclude/> <$button tooltip="Rearrange lists" set="$:/state/rearrlist" setTo="show">A <$button tooltip="Delete board" popup="$:/state/deleteboardpopup" style="fill:#fff;">{{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$reveal type="popup" class="tc-popup-keep" state="$:/state/deleteboardpopup">

delete Board<$button tag="span" style="right:0;position: absolute;padding: 0 3%;fill:#fff;cursor:pointer">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/deleteboardpopup"/>

This will delete the board, along with all its lists, its cards, items in card checkboxes

Are you sure?

<$button actions=<> class="md-close">Delete
<$button tooltip="Add new board" popup="$:/state/newboardstate"> + <$reveal state="$:/state/newboardstate" type="popup" class="tc-popup-keep" position="below" text="showthepopup">
Create Board
<$edit-text class="list-name-input" tiddler="$:/state/boardNewTitle" placeholder="What are you organizing?" default="New board" tag="input"/>
<$button style="background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#5AAC44 0,#519839 100%);background: linear-gradient(to bottom,#5AAC44 0,#519839 100%);" set="$:/state/newboardstate" setTo="" actions=<>>Create New Board
<$button tooltip="Switch back to TW5">@@fill:white;{{$:/core/images/opacity}}@@ <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[TwelloMode]!has[draft.of]]"> <$action-setfield tags="$:/tags/PageTemplate"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/Tekan/Main"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/Tekan/Substyles"/>
$:/Tekan/NavboardButtons.title: $:/Tekan/NavboardButtons

$:/Tekan/Substyles.creator: Riz
$:/Tekan/Substyles.title: $:/Tekan/Substyles

$:/Tikan/EditCardModal.text:
\define checklisttag() [[$(currentCard)$]] \end \define addchecklistitem() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/checklistitem}} tags=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/checklistitem" text=""/> \end \define archivechecklist() <$list filter="[tagtag[done]!tag[archive]]"> <$action-listops $tags="archive"/> \end
<$edit-text class="mod-card-back-title" style="overflow: hidden; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 26px;" tag="input" tiddler="$:/state/editcard"/>
in list <> <$list filter="[tag[archive]]">{{archive||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}}
<$button class="smallgreenbutton" style="margin-top: 10px;">Change <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="title" $value={{$:/state/editcard}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>
<$set name="currentCard" value={{$:/state/editcard}}>

Add Comment

<$edit-text class="comment-box-input" placeholder="Write a comment…" style="overflow: hidden; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 75px;" tiddler=<> default="No Comments"/>

Checklist

<$edit-text class="checklist-new-item-text " placeholder="Add an item…" style="overflow-x: hidden; overflow-y: scroll; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 48px;" tag="input" tiddler="$:/state/checklistitem" default="New item"/> <$button class="smallgreenbutton" actions=<>>Add
<$list filter="[tag!tag[done]!tag[archive]]"> <$checkbox tag="done"> <$view field="title"/> <$list filter="[tagtag[done]!tag[archive]]"> <$checkbox tag="done"> ~~<$view field="title"/>~~ <$button class="smallgreenbutton" style="background: #4DB6AC;color:#eee;margin: 5% 0;" actions=<>>Archive Done Checklist Items
<$button class="button-link" style="background: #EE6E73;color: #fff;">Delete <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$button class="button-link">Archive <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="archive"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$button class="button-link">Done <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>
$:/Tikan/EditCardModal.title: $:/Tikan/EditCardModal

$:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme.creator: Riz
$:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme.text:
! Tekan

Tekan is a simple kanban client using TW5.
$:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme.title: $:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme
